Dr. Toast Live @ Spring Training 2011

posted May 17, 2011 | music, shows

Sunday, May 22, 2011, 12-8pm - (Dr. Toast @ 1pm) - False Profit, LLC brings you the 5th annual Spring Training in Joaquin Miller Park, in the lush hills of Oakland, CA. Come dance to the beats in the sun by the waterfall! Joining the Dr. are such luminaries as benchun, Digital Rust, Eugene Steele, Evolutionista, Obi-J, Shipwrek, and Tinker. FREE! [info, map, photos]
